alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jasper; Jefferson; Newton; Orange; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued June 01 at 11:20PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The following message is transmitted at the request of the Texas Department of Public Safety. THE MONTGOMERY COUNTY SHERIFF`S OFFICE IS SEARCHING FOR MANSA IGBOKWE, BLACK MALE, 3 MONTHS OLD, HEIGHT 20 INCHES, 15 LBS, LONG CURLY BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES, AND WEARING A WHITE ONESIE WITH PICTURES. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR OBINNA IGBOKWE BLACK MALE, 41 YEARS OLD, 6-00, 190 LBS, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES AND WEARING A TAN SHIRT AND BROWN PANTS, IN CONNECTION WITH HIS ABDUCTION. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A WHITE, 2008 HONDA ACCORD WITH DARK TINTED WINDOWS WITH A TX LICENSE PLATE NUMBER OF KMY0702. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST HEARD FROM IN SPRING, TX. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THIS CHILD TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE MONTGOMERY COUNTY SHERIFF`S OFFICE AT 936-760-5800 OPTION 3. NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS MONTGOMERY COUNTY SHERIFF`S OFFICE AT 936-538-3456.
